summary: This is an email chain discussing urgent counseling arrangements for an Epstein victim, including payment details ($200 per session) and coordination with a counseling service. The correspondence shows logistical support being organized for a victim.

persons.name: MEr
persons.context: Appears to be communicating about arranging and potentially paying for counseling sessions for an Epstein victim.

events.title: Coordination for victim counseling
events.description: Email correspondence discussing payment and scheduling for urgent counseling sessions for an Epstein victim.

keyFacts: Document shows active coordination in September 2019 to arrange counseling for an Epstein victim.
Counseling sessions were priced at $200 each, with a sliding scale for those making less than $50,000.
Payment was being arranged, potentially in advance, for six sessions.
The counseling service accepted credit card payments and could see the victim the following week.
